english.segment1: Everything I know. Tells me she's everything. That I could hope for. Everything I know. Tells me I can't let her walk away
english.segment2: I took my time to find the words. I hope she'd feel the same
english.segment3: 'Cause I want someone to share my smile. To share the pain. To be there when the sea turns gray. To share the joy. For better or worse
english.segment4: {chorus}: And I thought that it might have been her. I thought that it might have been her
english.segment5: Wonder if she knows. The way I saw her soul. Light up my life. Wonder if she knows. of the pain I feel tonight
